title: Tristana Rocket Girl Chroma Visual and Audio Bug
body:
The Chromas for Rocket Girl Tristana currently has the animation and audio of Original Tristana
Examples:
http://imgur.com/dElehed
http://imgur.com/noKxF6L
http://imgur.com/9ost6wV
http://imgur.com/UDdgIza

replies.body: Thanks for the report! It appears that the team is working to resolve this issue. :)
